title: Kingqa980
author: Kingqa980
content: I have won the lambo round 9 on freebitcoin website but they are not replying to my mails kow on their customer support email please somebody knows how to claim the reward now help me guys..

comments.author: Orpichukwu
comments.body: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=320959.0Try contacting them through their thread member their is someone from the team who might be able to help you from their, or other experience users who might have claimed reward will be happy to assist. Good luck claiming your reward.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.created_time: October 17, 2023, 03:05:01 PMLast edit: October 17, 2023, 03:16:49 PM by hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: Kingqa980 on October 17, 2023, 02:38:53 PMI have won the lambo round 9 on freebitcoin website but they are not replying to my mails kow on their customer support email please somebody knows how to claim the reward now help me guys.. PM ---> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=143168is this your alt account @Kingqa980? that account posted a similar story, *are you sure you visited the real domain and not a phishing link?They have been here for a while and I do not expect them to be scammers, so you must contact them with proof and your problem will be solved.* I didn't notice that it was the same account because it was brand new.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: Kingqa980 on October 17, 2023, 02:38:53 PMI have won the lambo round 9 on freebitcoin website <...>How do you know that you've won? Typically, you should receive an email from them explaining how to claim the prize. Congratulations on the win if it's indeed true!

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: Kingqa980 on October 17, 2023, 07:24:27 PMYes sir same message i got on my email and they told Claim Your Lamborghini Huracan Now!Are you sure that the source of this message is from Freebitco.in?Never heard someone win a Lamborghini if this email is legit then contact them directly and ask how to claim your Lambo.About the email how to check if it was from a legit site you need to click the drop-down near "to me". Look at the image sample below for reference.-

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Kingqa980 on October 17, 2023, 09:57:49 PMYes bro its from them You can see the post on twitter and their facebook page I am the winner of lambo 13517688 is my freebitco.in account IDTo exclude the possibility of trolling and suspiciousness, is there a possibility for you to upload screenshots on talkimg.com with evidence that this ID 13517688 is yours?I'm somehow convinced that you must have received some kind of email notification about the award. Even if it was an automatic message.Post here all the evidence you can collect before any action.Quote from: decodx on October 17, 2023, 05:48:19 PMHow do you know that you've won? Typically, you should receive an email from them explaining how to claim the prize. freebitco.in publicly announces the ID of the user who wins the prize after the lottery. This information is available to everyone, which opens up the possibility that anyone can claim on the Internet that they are the winner.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Kingqa980 on October 17, 2023, 02:38:53 PMI have won the lambo round 9 on freebitcoin website but they are not replying to my mails kow on their customer support email please somebody knows how to claim the reward now help me guys.. All you have to do is secure your account since you claim you are the winner do not post anything that will compromise your identity and your account, the instruction is to contact them so contact them they have you in their database you are traced including your email they will not going to response to any emails but only your email so use the email that you've used to contact Freebitco.in and alert them through their social media that you sent email in response to the email you received coming from them.Update us after you receive your lambo and congratulations to you, you're one lucky guy.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: They're probably receiving hundreds if not thousands of bogus claims in their emails every time a win-a-lambo round ends. They probably won't bother replying to these fake claims. My guess is that you're one of them, that's why they immediately disregard your email. So, the best thing to do if you're the real winner and they didn't reach out to you is to provide them with all the proofs that you're indeed user 13517688 so that they would take you seriously. If you have proofs, try sending TheQuin a PM. I think he's a support staff of freebitco.

comments.author: Kingqa980
comments.body: I have already sent the whole proofs to The Quin But he is still offline from 14th of october I am very sad because of no response Ia m not one of those liars I am the real person and the real winner

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: Kingqa980 on October 20, 2023, 02:23:20 AMI have already sent the whole proofs to The Quin But he is still offline from 14th of october I am very sad because of no response Ia m not one of those liars I am the real person and the real winnerIf you really won the Lambo, then you have nothing to worry about if there is nothing that would disqualify you, and it is stated in the terms of use. I assume you know that there is a choice when it comes to the prize, a Lambo or $200k in BTC, and if you decide on this first, be sure that it will take time to get your prize, and I don't even want to speculate what the price is for something like that to be delivered, and of course how much tax do you have to pay to import such a car.If you are really a winner, then you just need a little more patience, you have already done the hardest part

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: Kingqa980 on October 20, 2023, 02:23:20 AMI have already sent the whole proofs to The Quin But he is still offline from 14th of october I am very sad because of no response Ia m not one of those liars I am the real person and the real winnerCare to share that proof here as well? Another thing, how exactly they contacted you in order to inform you that you wont the price and are you sure that there wasn't any instruction how exactly to claim your prize?Quote from: Lucius on October 20, 2023, 12:35:06 PMI assume you know that there is a choice when it comes to the prize, a Lambo or $200k in BTC, and if you decide on this first, be sure that it will take time to get your prize, and I don't even want to speculate what the price is for something like that to be delivered, and of course how much tax do you have to pay to import such a car.Tbh, I don't think that anyone in their right mind would chose Lambo as God knows what kind of taxes you would have to pay in order to get that car to your country. After all, this lambo prize seems to me more like a good marketing stunt as it sounds better than giving xyz amount of dollars in BTC.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: Rikafip on October 20, 2023, 01:49:23 PMQuote from: Lucius on October 20, 2023, 12:35:06 PMI assume you know that there is a choice when it comes to the prize, a Lambo or $200k in BTC, and if you decide on this first, be sure that it will take time to get your prize, and I don't even want to speculate what the price is for something like that to be delivered, and of course how much tax do you have to pay to import such a car.Tbh, I don't think that anyone in their right mind would chose Lambo as God knows what kind of taxes you would have to pay in order to get that car to your country. After all, this lambo prize seems to me more like a good marketing stunt as it sounds better than giving xyz amount of dollars in BTC.  I'm not sure, but I think TheQuin once mentioned that no one has opted for a Lambo as a prize yet, but instead chose to receive an equivalent amount in BTC. This choice makes sense as it's much more practical.Speaking of TheQuin,  it's kinda strange that he has been away from the forums for so long. I hope everything's alright with him.@Kingqa980, if you're still waiting for a response to your messages, you might want to try PMing wetsuit. Even though he's not active on the forum, he should get an email notification.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Kingqa980 on October 20, 2023, 02:23:20 AMI have already sent the whole proofs to The Quin But he is still offline from 14th of october I am very sad because of no response Ia m not one of those liars I am the real person and the real winnerThe fact that you have this thread and they announce the ID of the account they know how to contact or reach out to you, since they announce the winner and its ID people are waiting for the winner to claim the prize, if they announce that its already claim while you claim you did not then there's a problem along the way so be patient you will eventually reach each other, just be sure you protect your account by doing screenshots and saving all the information that will prove that you are the legit winner.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: Kingqa980 on October 20, 2023, 02:23:20 AMI have already sent the whole proofs to The Quin But he is still offline from 14th of october I am very sad because of no response Ia m not one of those liars I am the real person and the real winnerPeople would be glad if you can send the screenshot of the actual message/email of the notification that you are the one who won the lambo prize

comments.author: Kingqa980
comments.body: I am not here to make happy anyone I am here for my rights so pleasw help me I have already sent the info to the quin

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: Kingqa980 on October 20, 2023, 04:59:01 PMI am not here to make happy anyone I am here for my rights so pleasw help me I have already sent the info to the quin People are advising you and assuring you that you will get your prize what more can you ask for, your excitement gets the best of you, you have done your part already you post here you send messages to their social media, and answer their emails I'm sure they will eventually make an announcement reach out for you, they already announce the winner and now they have to confirm that the winner receives the reward.If they fail to reach out to you or ignore you then they will lose their reputation.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: Kingqa980 on October 17, 2023, 02:38:53 PMI have won the lambo round 9 on freebitcoin website but they are not replying to my mails kow on their customer support email please somebody knows how to claim the reward now help me guys.. Show some proof that you won lambo, or it didn't happen.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Quote from: Kingqa980 on October 20, 2023, 04:59:01 PMI am not here to make happy anyone I am here for my rights so pleasw help me I have already sent the info to the quin Wait for your reply by email or via TheQuin, we can't help you with anything because the information is not clear, when some ask for proof you don't provide it then we don't believe you are talking about.You are entitled to what you want even if you don't want to share screenshots.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: dkbit98 on October 20, 2023, 06:45:30 PMQuote from: Kingqa980 on October 17, 2023, 02:38:53 PMI have won the lambo round 9 on freebitcoin website but they are not replying to my mails kow on their customer support email please somebody knows how to claim the reward now help me guys.. Show some proof that you won lambo, or it didn't happen.I wonder what's keeping him he can show small details and just hide the vital information since the winning ID has been announced there is no way for them to manipulate the results, something should happen in the coming weeks since there is one claiming that he is the winner and many can see this thread, there's going to be a problem if other persons come outs but so far only you, so the issue here is communication.What we can assure you is Freebitco.in will honor and should honor its commitment to continue its operation and its lottery contest.
